plugins.name: proagent-hr
plugins.description: Human resources and talent management: job descriptions, interviews, onboarding, performance reviews, compensation analysis, and CV validation at scale with multi-agent orchestration and blind review.

plugins.name: proagent-sales
plugins.description: Sales operations: proposals, RFP responses, pricing strategies, CRM management, deal pipeline tracking, competitive analysis, lead research, and quote generation.

plugins.name: proagent-finance
plugins.description: Financial operations: budgeting, invoicing, revenue forecasting, P&L analysis, cost optimization, billing, and financial reporting.

plugins.name: proagent-delivery
plugins.description: Project delivery management: sprint planning, milestone tracking, stakeholder updates, status reports, risk assessment, retrospectives, and agile workflows.

plugins.name: proagent-data
plugins.description: Data engineering and analytics: data pipelines, warehousing, dbt transformations, SQL optimization, data quality, schema design, and exploratory analysis.

plugins.name: proagent-ml-ai
plugins.description: ML and AI operations: model training, MLOps pipelines, experiment tracking, prompt engineering, embeddings, vector stores, LLM apps, and RAG systems.

plugins.name: proagent-agentic-engineering
plugins.description: Agentic engineering: building and orchestrating AI agent systems, MCP servers, multi-agent workflows, plugin development, and prompt engineering.

plugins.name: proagent-sdlc
plugins.description: Software development lifecycle: architecture decisions, code review, testing strategy, release planning, documentation, versioning, and git workflows.

plugins.name: proagent-platform
plugins.description: Platform engineering: developer platforms, internal tooling, service catalogs, golden paths, scaffolding, DX optimization, and template libraries.

plugins.name: proagent-devops
plugins.description: DevOps operations: CI/CD pipelines, Docker/Kubernetes, Terraform/IaC, monitoring, incident response, and cloud operations across AWS and GCP.

plugins.name: proagent-qa
plugins.description: Quality assurance: test automation with Playwright and Cypress, unit/integration/E2E testing, regression, performance, and accessibility testing.

plugins.name: proagent-backend
plugins.description: Backend engineering: REST/GraphQL/gRPC APIs, database schema design, microservices, authentication, message queues, caching, and performance optimization.

plugins.name: proagent-frontend
plugins.description: Frontend engineering: React/Vue/Angular components, design systems, accessibility auditing, responsive design, performance optimization, and theming.

plugins.name: proagent-security
plugins.description: Security operations: vulnerability scanning, compliance enforcement, secrets management, encryption, threat modeling, OWASP Top 10, and Zero Trust architecture.

plugins.name: proagent-router
plugins.description: Provectus practice router: single /proagent command that detects the domain from user input and dispatches to the appropriate practice specialist across all 15 plugins.
